snippet.title: Front Mission Evolved - Wanzer Pack 2 DLC Trailer | HD
snippet.description:
New weapons and Wanzers are coming with Weapons Pack 1 and Wanzer Pack 2!

DOWNLOAD the DLC from Xbox Marketplace: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Front-Mission-Evolved-Wanzer-Pack-2/a92f0971-5269-471d-9ede-d5edb9e1b194?cid=SLink
ORDER TODAY: Front Mission Evolved - http://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B003QPGNDY?ie=UTF8&tag=xboxviewtv-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1638&creative=6742&creativeASIN=B003QPGNDY

Front Mission Evolved - Wanzer Pack 2 DLC Trailer | HD
Developer: Double Helix
Release Date: Sep 28, 2010(Game) - Nov 2, 2010(DLC)
Genre: Shooter, Third-Person, Action
Platform: Xbox 360, PS3, PC
Publisher: Square Enix
Website: http://www.FrontMissionEvolved.com/
ESRB: T
